titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives on contract breaches and other failures under the F-35 aircraft program.
Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives on contract breaches and other failures under the F-35 aircraft program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that Lockheed Martin and its subcontractors are in breach of contract with respect to the deliverables on the F-35 aircraft contract, and the Department of Defense has failed to adequately hold itself and Lockheed Martin accountable for the numerous failures within the F-35 aircraft program.
